author: Les McLaren
comment: Accuracy looks to be high but it does take a long time to read fully, over 2 minutes average. Not sure if this is because I have arterial fibulation or inherent in the app. Using Samsung S8 running 8.0

author: Bethany Mills
comment: Works great for galaxy s8 plus!  I did it 3 times to be sure I get a close number which 3 times the numbers were one percent off each time now my fingers are small so takes a while for me to position it perfectly over the scanner and plus I am fidgety so hard for me to stay still but so far so good!

author: Chi Kid6
comment: Great app.  Tried others but this one gives out best rhythm and accurate heartbeat.  It's nice to document certain readings throughout the day to help see consistency or abnormalities

author: Krislyn Tritapoe
comment: Better hope you have all week to do a reading... Takes forever and isn't accurate.. Said my heart rate was 130 sitting still when it was barely 60

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: Your phone with 2 rear camera? Please cover each until it give you the result . You can email us for support

author: Zubair Baker
comment: Not sure if it's because of my phone (Galaxy Prime Plus) or what but finger burns when getting HR. Probably the phone's flash but app may be utilizing flash on its brightest.

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: You can just cover the lens, not the flash led

author: David Placko
comment: This has so far been the most reliable HR monitor I have used with my wear watch. However, there are a few things that prevent me from giving it more stars. 1:  It places an alarm status in the status bar. This drove me nuts!  I couldn't figure out why I had an alarm when I hadn't set one in the clock app. I finally figured out that it was HRP because I had it set to read automatically from my watch every 15 mins. 2:  Since I'm using my wearable to take readings, I don't require the use of the camera for them. But, when I launch the app (to look at the history) it want to take a reading with the camera. Thus the LED lights up. It would be nice to have a toggle.  EDIT:  There IS an option in the latest version to open the app in history. 3:  Finally, I'd like to see more history than the last 7 readings. Perhaps daily, weekly, monthly charts. Other than these slight personal issues, this has been by far the most reliable heart rate monitor I've used with my wearable. Hoping to.see.some improvements with future releases.  EDIT 3/2/18:  Appears ALL my concerns have been addressed. 5 stars and thank you!

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content:
Hello David,
Thank for your feedback. We reply in the email, please check it.

author: robert henderson
comment: DO NOT BUY. Purchased and now won't take a measurement. Downloaded 3 others to make sure that it wasn't my phone and they work just fine.

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content:
Hello,
Can you detais your problem? You can email us for support or refund. Just send order number from Play Store email.

author: Letesha Thomas
comment: The app is cool but it won't download on my watch! I have tried multiple times. I'd like to keep using this app. Any suggestions on how to get it actually download on my watch?

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: What is your watch? App only support Android watch and it must has heart rate sensor.

author: Arthur Morris
comment: Seems pretty accurate. I compared it to my no cuff, and it's pretty much on point.

author: Michel Boily
comment: The light sensor on my LG G6 becomes very hot to the point you cannot keep your finger long enough to mesure the hearth beat

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: If you feel too hot, just cover the camera and not the flash led.

comment: Its helpful when you need it but reading the other reviews im definetley not gonna buy the ads remove stuff but ill still  use the app
Great app that works perfectly with android wear, really nice to find a app that will keep checking your pulse in the background  Keep up the great work

author: R Javed
comment: After purchasing the premium the ads are still there, you have to purchase ad remover separate! What a freaking joke 🤥

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: One you buy for the Wear, and one for your phone. It is normally.

author: Roland Robinson
comment: Couldn't even use this app placing my finger directly over the flash on my camera for so long it began to burn my finger

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: You just cover the camera, not the flash

comment: THIS HELPS ME KEEP TRACK OF HEART RATE ACCORDING NURSES THAT COMES THIS IS PRETTY ACCURATE TO 2 BPM

author: Darko Radovanovic
comment: Great app. Works fine on android wear and syncs with google fit. Great thing is that you can set it up to measure heart rate in intervals...

author: Nathan Budd
comment: It isn't sending the correct range of values to Google Fit. I've got max 60, min 60, avg 60. I'm seeing 57-61.

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: It is difference. On the app only last 7 measurement. On Google Fit you can choose day, week or month

author: Jen Kniss
comment: Gnarly full-volume ads pop up after every time you take a measurment. Deleted.

author: Micah L
comment: Unreliable. Works about half the time for me, and only if I've been sitting still.  Uninstalling

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: We note in the app, stay still or it hard to get a result, you can touch (with a little force) your heart rate sensor if you are in movement. And please use sensor instead of the camera, i has better accuracy, you can check the Settings page.

comment: My finger gets burnt when i use it..isnt there any other way to use it withoutyour finger getting burnt.?

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: You can just cover the camera lens and not the flash led.

author: Reijo Lell
comment: Uses S8 sensor not only camera. Non other, that I know of do this

author: Bonnie Smith
comment: Better than other HRM apps I have tried.  Does what it claims to do.  Will keep using it.

author: Michelle Marrs
comment: 10 secs to register 💓 beat? I've read and done what instructions ask, held for the longest 10 minutes!

author: Dominik Sparling
comment: This app is amazing. Irá exactly what I needed! I use Google Fit, but have a Samsung and this does everything! It uses the Samsung sensor and sends the data to Google Fit.

author: Be NotAfraid
comment: Had to switch apps when Cardiogram stopped working and it works well and has 1 minute readings, which is the feature I use most but it would be really nice if you made a setting that divided the history by day instead of just month. And maybe made it so the graph could display more than the last 7 readings for settings that read every 1 minute.

author: Olwyn Oduinn
comment: Best app for HR. If you have POTS, USE THIS APP!

author: Mark Ferris
comment: Gives a quick measure of your heart beat rate and displays history in an easy to read format with average trends. Sometimes takes a couple of goes to get an accurate measure.

author: Derek Mullins
comment: Great little app that does exactly what it claims to do.. The link to smart watch is very valuable

author: Trystyn Cooper
comment: It was great I tried it several times to make sure it was around the same bpm and it was!! I think this is a very useful and helpful app!! Defently worth the download

author: Ellyssa Elliott
comment: This is a great way to compare heart rates and determine heart rate  without access to doctor

author: colin allison
comment: Have a heart issue so good to use on regular occasions

author: ben m
comment: Almost burnt my finger off

reply.author: PVDApps
reply.content: If it too hot. You can just cover the camera lens, not the flash led.

author: Anna Romero
comment: Good app for tracking HR before/ exercise

author: Rob Schilling
comment: Works better and less as intrusive than most free versions out there (of which there are many)

author: Azi

reply.content: Are your read the manual? When you waving your phone, the camera lens change too, it will cause the error.

author: Douglas & Nancy Young
comment: Perfect reading right in line with my blood pressure cuff perfect reading right in line with my BP cuff

author: Martus Claassen
comment: I use it to measure heart rate and it does that very well.

author: Sep Raben
comment: Prima app, meet snel en helpt me mijn ritme storing te documenteren
Very much working in samsung s5 It is worked by the senser's in such devices

author: Elias Almendarez Sr.
